page.title: 06CHRISTIAN SALVESEN
page.content: Christian Salvesen offers every service that the frozen food industry requires. They do sorting, storing, weighing and delivery to different places.They have flo-freezers which can handle peas, beans and many other vegetables.They also have horizontal plate freezers which are used for vegetables and fish.There is a modern repacking hall on site equipped with weigh-fill machinery.They also have hand packing on offer. Any size and type of pack can be handled. Lowestoft is also one of the U.K's leading companies in the storage and handling of frozen poultry. This Suffolk store is well placed to serve East Anglia and London. Christian Salvesen is the second largest cold store in Europe, and also the second largest factory in the Salvesen network.
